frames.core.constraint

Class LocalConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • frames.core.constraint.Constraint
      • frames.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint
        • frames.core.constraint.LocalConstraint

  • public class LocalConstraint
extends AxisPlaneConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the Frame local coordinate system.

    The AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection() and AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection() are expressed in the Frame local coordinate system (see Frame.reference() ).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class frames.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        AxisPlaneConstraint.Type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalConstraint() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion constrainRotation(Quaternion rotation, Frame frame)
      When AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of Type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the Frame local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
      Vector constrainTranslation(Vector translation, Frame frame)
      Depending on AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

      • Methods inherited from class frames.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        rotationConstraintDirection, rotationConstraintType, setRotationConstraint, setRotationConstraintDirection, setRotationConstraintType, setTranslationConstraint, setTranslationConstraintDirection, setTranslationConstraintType, translationConstraintDirection, translationConstraintType

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
